colors.name: Blue
colors.description: A blue color that automatically adapts to the current trait environment.

colors.description: A brown color that automatically adapts to the current trait environment.

colors.name: Gray
colors.description: The standard base gray color that adapts to the environment.

colors.name: Gray 2
colors.description: A second-level shade of gray that adapts to the environment.

colors.name: Gray 3
colors.description: A third-level shade of gray that adapts to the environment.

colors.name: Label
colors.description: The color for text labels that contain primary content.

colors.name: Secondary Label
colors.description: The color for text labels that contain secondary content.

colors.name: Tertiary Label
colors.description: The color for text labels that contain tertiary content.

colors.name: Quaternary Label
colors.description: The color for text labels that contain quaternary content.

colors.name: System Fill
colors.description: An overlay fill color for thin and small shapes.

colors.name: Secondary System Fill
colors.description: An overlay fill color for medium-size shapes.

colors.name: Tertiary System Fill
colors.description: An overlay fill color for large shapes.

colors.name: Quaternary System Fill
colors.description: An overlay fill color for large areas that contain complex content.

colors.name: Placeholder Text
colors.description: The color for placeholder text in controls or text views.

colors.name: System Background
colors.description: The color for the main background of your interface. Use this color for standard table views and designs that have a white primary background in a light environment.

colors.name: Secondary System Background
colors.description: The color for content layered on top of the main background. Use this color for standard table views and designs that have a white primary background in a light environment.

colors.name: Tertiary System Background
colors.description: The color for content layered on top of secondary backgrounds. Use this color for standard table views and designs that have a white primary background in a light environment.

colors.name: System Grouped Background
colors.description: The color for the main background of your grouped interface.

colors.name: Secondary System Grouped Background
colors.description: The color for content layered on top of the main background of your grouped interface. Use this color for grouped content, including table views and platter-based designs.

colors.name: Tertiary System Grouped Background
colors.description: The color for content layered on top of secondary backgrounds of your grouped interface.

colors.name: Separator
colors.description: The color for thin borders or divider lines that allows some underlying content to be visible.

colors.name: Opaque Separator
colors.description: The color for borders or divider lines that hides any underlying content.

colors.name: Link
colors.description: The specified color for links.

colors.name: Dark Text
colors.description: The nonadaptable system color for text on a light background.

colors.name: Light Text
colors.description: The nonadaptable system color for text on a dark background.
